singOfferings1.description: Upgrade this to get +2% Offerings per level, forever!

singOfferings2.name: Offering Storm
singOfferings2.description: Apparently, you can use this bar to attract more Offerings. +8% per level, to be precise.

singOfferings3.name: Offering Tempest
singOfferings3.description: This bar is so prestine, it'll make anyone submit their Offerings. +4% per level, to be precise.

singObtainium1.name: Obtainium-Welle
singObtainium1.description: Verbessere dies, um +2% Obtainium pro Level zu erhalten, für immer!

singObtainium2.name: Obtainium-Flut
singObtainium2.description: Holy crap, water bending! +8% gained Obtainium per level.

singObtainium3.name: Obtainium-Tsunami
singObtainium3.description: Eine steigende Flut hebt alle Boote. +4% mehr Obtainium pro Level.

singCubes1.name: Würfel-Flamme
singCubes1.description: Verbessere dies, um +1% Würfel pro Level zu erhalten, für immer!

singCubes2.name: Würfel-Brand
singCubes2.description: Verbrenne einige weitere goldene Quarks! +8% mehr Würfel pro Stufe.

singCubes3.name: Würfel-Inferno
singCubes3.description: Sogar Dante ist beeindruckt: +4% mehr Würfel pro Stufe.

singCitadel.name: Zitadelle der Singularität
singCitadel.description: What a unique structual phenomenon... but it gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels!

singCitadel2.name: Zitadelle der 'Singularität': Die wahre Edition
singCitadel2.description: This actual Citadel gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels! Also sets the free level of the fake citadel to whatever level this is.

octeractUnlock.name: Octeracts
octeractUnlock.description: MOMENT MAL!!! Was willst du damit erreichen?!?
octeractUnlock.effectHave: You have bought into the Octeract hype.
octeractUnlock.effectHaveNot: You have not bought into the Octeract hype.

singOcteractPatreonBonus.name: Platonic $ells out!!!
singOcteractPatreonBonus.description: You know that Patreon bonus? Yeah, that's cool and all, but what if it also boosted Octeract production by the same amount?
singOcteractPatreonBonus.effect: Octeract production is {{n}}% faster for every $10 per month on the Patreon! Same as the Quark bonus which already exists.

offeringAutomatic.name: Blueberry Shards! (WIP)
offeringAutomatic.description:
Die Legenden sind wahr.
Die Prophezeiungen wurden erfüllt.
Der Ameisengott hat deine Gebete erhört.
Es soll Blaubeeren geben!
Und sie waren gut.

intermediatePack.name: Mittleres Paket
intermediatePack.description: Verdopple die Globale-Geschwindigkeit, multipliziere die Aufstiegsgeschwindigkeit mit 1,5 und erhalte +2% Quarks für immer. 2% Quark-Milch... lecker.
intermediatePack.effectHave: Du hast dein Paket zum mittleren Paket aufgewertet.
intermediatePack.effectHaveNot: Du hast dein Paket nicht zum mittleren Paket aufgewertet.

advancedPack.name: Fortgeschrittenes Paket
advancedPack.description: Now we're cooking with kerosene! Gain +4% Quarks stack with intermediate, +0.33 to all corruption score multipliers, regardless of level!
advancedPack.effectHave: Sie haben unser fortgeschrittenes Paket gekauft.
advancedPack.effectHaveNot: Sie haben unser fortgeschrittenes Paket nicht gekauft.

expertPack.name: Expertenpaket
expertPack.description: That's a handful! Gain +6% Quarks stack with advanced, 1.5x Ascension Score, Code 'add' gives 1.2x Ascension Timer.
expertPack.effectHaveNot: Sie sind nicht zum Experten-Anbieter gewechselt.

masterPack.name: Meister-Paket
masterPack.description: A tad insane. Gain +8% Quarks stack with expert, for every level 14 corruption, Ascension score is multiplied by 1.1.
masterPack.effectHave: Du hast deine inneren Chakras gemeistert.
masterPack.effectHaveNot: Du hast deine inneren Chakras nicht gemeistert.

divinePack.name: Göttliches Paket
divinePack.description: OHHHHH. Gain +10% Quarks stack with master, and multiply Octeract gain by 7.77 if corruptions are all set to 14.
divinePack.effectHave: Du hast den Grund für die Existenz gefunden.
divinePack.effectHaveNot: Du hast den Grund für die Existenz nicht gefunden.

wowPass2.name: Markt-Räumungsverkauf
wowPass2.description: The Seal Merchant needs to get rid of some exotic goods. Only for a steep price. I do not think that is how sales work.
wowPass2.effectHave: Sie haben das Liquidation Event ausgelöst!
wowPass2.effectHaveNot: Sie haben das Liquidation Event nicht ausgelöst!

wowPass3.name: QUAAAACK
wowPass3.description: QUAAAAAAAACK. The Merchant has gone crazy for your QUARKS!
wowPass3.effectHaveNot: Sie haben die QUACKSTRAVAGANZA nicht ausgelöst!!

potionBuff.name: Potion Decanter of Enlightenment
potionBuff.description: Dieser Gegenstand soll eigentlich die Quelle der Jugend sein, er verstärkt Tränke erheblich!

potionBuff2.name: Potion Decanter of Inquisition
potionBuff2.description: Beim Anblick des Glases bist du dir nicht wirklich sicher, was dieser Trank ist.

potionBuff3.name: Potion Decanter of Maddening Instability
potionBuff3.description: SHE'S GONNA BLOW!!!! Said Midas, the Golden Quark Salesman. Oh yeah, did we mention he's in the game?

singChallengeExtension.name: Höhere Challenge-Caps
singChallengeExtension.description: Need more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension.effect: Du fühlst dich motiviert genug, um {{n}} weitere Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen abzuschließen und {{m}} weitere Aufstiegs-Herausforderungen.

singChallengeExtension2.name: Höherere Challenge-Caps
singChallengeExtension2.description: Need even more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension2.effect: Du fühlst dich motiviert genug, um {{n}} weitere Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen abzuschließen und {{m}} weitere Aufstiegs-Herausforderungen.

singChallengeExtension3.name: HöherereRE Challenge-Caps
singChallengeExtension3.description: Need even MORE Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level. Does it not seem excessive?
singChallengeExtension3.effect: Du fühlst dich motiviert genug, um {{n}} weitere Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen abzuschließen und {{m}} weitere Aufstiegs-Herausforderungen.

singQuarkImprover1.name: Marginales Quark Einkommen Verbesserer Ding
singQuarkImprover1.description: A doohickey that I forgot what it looked like. +0.5% Quarks per level, multiplicative with all other bonuses! Seems like it grows in cost a lot faster than anything else though. Also, did you know these descriptions can be arbitarily long?

singQuarkHepteract.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better.
singQuarkHepteract.description: Wrong game, oops. Anyway, would you like a very slightly better DR exponent on Quark Hepteract?
singQuarkHepteract.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singQuarkHepteract2.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better II.
singQuarkHepteract2.description: Still not the right game. Same as the previous upgrade.
singQuarkHepteract2.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singQuarkHepteract3.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better III.
singQuarkHepteract3.description: I AM NOT THE GODMOTHER YOU ARE LOOKING FOR, DYLAN!
singQuarkHepteract3.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singOcteractGain.name: Octeract Absinthe
singOcteractGain.description: You would have never known this tonic can boost your Octeracts! [+1.25% per level, in fact!]

singOcteractGain2.name: Pieces of Eight
singOcteractGain2.description: There is indeed eight of them, but each only gives +0.625% bonus, so each level gives +5% Octeract per level.

singOcteractGain3.name: The Obelisk Shaped like an Octagon.
singOcteractGain3.description: Platonic had to reach pretty far here. +2.5% Octeracts yeah!

singOcteractGain4.name: Octahedral Synthesis
singOcteractGain4.description: How does this even work!?? +2% Octeracts, you bet!

singOcteractGain5.name: Das achte Wunder der Welt
singOcteractGain5.description: is the wonder of the world we live in. [+1% Octeracts. Platonic, this is so stingy! but, he does not care one bit.]

platonicTau.name: Platonic TAU
platonicTau.description: Placed in the wrong upgrade section, this will remove any restrictions on corruptions or corruption level caps! Also raises 3d cube gain to the power of 1.01!

platonicAlpha.name: Platonic ALPHA...?
platonicAlpha.description: Confusion ensues as to why there are two of these. This one is capitalized, so buying this ensures Platonic Alpha is always maxed!

platonicDelta.name: Platonic DELTA
platonicDelta.description: Time follows you towards the future, after getting this bad boy. Gain +100% more cubes per day in your current singularity, up to +900% at day 9.

platonicPhi.name: Platonic PHI
platonicPhi.description: Die Zeit folgt auch in die Vergangenheit. Erhalte 5 zusätzliche kostenlose Singularität-Upgrades pro Tag in der Singularität vom Code 'daily', bis zu +50 nach 10 Tagen.

singFastForward.name: Etherflux-Singularitäten
singFastForward.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 100% (additive), and going singular at your all time highest count gives +1 singularity count!

singFastForward2.name: Aetherflux Singularities
singFastForward2.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 100% (additive) and going singular at your all time highest count gives +1 singularity count! It's like Etherflux but with an A.

singAscensionSpeed.name: A hecking good ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed.description: Ascension Speed is raised to the power of 1.03, raised to 0.97 if less than 1x.

singAscensionSpeed2.name: A mediocre ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed2.description: Ascension speed is multiplied by 6 if you have not purchased Antiquities in your current Singularity.

WIP.name: WIP VORLAGE
WIP.description: Dies ist eine Vorlage! Unterer Text.
WIP.effect: Diese Beschreibung wird zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt aktualisiert!!!!!!!!!!

ultimatePen.name: Der ultimative Stift
ultimatePen.description: Du. Du bist der Autor deiner eigenen Geschichte!
ultimatePen.effect: You do {{n}} own the Ultimate Pen. {{m}}

oneMind.name: ONE MIND
oneMind.description: A note, you found on the 'ground': seems like an advertisement for a cult. "Lock your ascension speed to 10x, and multiply all cubes based on the difference." Hmm...
oneMind.effectHaveNot: Du bist dem Kult nicht beigetreten!

wowPass4.name: QUQUQUQUAAKCKCKKCKKCKK
wowPass4.description: Deals that'll cost you a beak and a wing!
wowPass4.effectHave: You have quacked your last QUARK
wowPass4.effectHaveNot: You haven't quacked your last QUARK

blueberries.name: Blueberry Shards! (WIP)
blueberries.description: Blueberries! Yeah, Platonic is out of ideas. Well, each Blueberry gives a 0.01% chance per second to generate some Ambrosia!

singAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Vergoldete Beeren des Glücks
singAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Literally put some gold onto 'berries' and become lucky. ☘ +2 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Dedizierte Goldschmelze
singAmbrosiaLuck3.description: More gold is dipped onto each berry. ☘ +3 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck.name: Absolute Hot
singAmbrosiaLuck.description: Your gold smelters get arbitrarily close to 'Absolute Hot'. ☘ +4 Ambrosia Luck per level, infinitely levelable!

singAmbrosiaLuck4.name: The Alchemists from the Beginning of the Game Work for your Golden Berry Needs
singAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Yeah, these upgrade titles can be arbitrarily long, too. ☘ +5 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Hourglass of Importance
singAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat important hourglass which somehow makes your blueberries generate seconds 1% faster per level..

singAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Hourglass of Significance
singAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still important, perhaps even more so. +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

singAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Stundenglas der Limitlosigkeit
singAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Remember- this hourglass is really important. But it gives +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level and is infinitely levelable!

singAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Stundenglas der Fantasie
singAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is unimportant and 'less timely'- whatever that means. +2% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

penalties.cubeUpgradeCosts: <<Silver|Cube Upgrade costs>> (Ausschließende Cookies) werden mit <<Silver|{{multiplier}}>> multipliziert.
penalties.penaltySmooth: You will no longer experience sudden spikes in penalties.
penalties.penaltyRough: Deine Strafen werden in <<var(--red-text-color)|Singularity {{num}}>> stark verschlimmert.
penalties.antiquitiesBought: <<var(--green-text-color)|Antiquities of Ant God is maxed! Penalties are dispelled!>>
penalties.antiquitiesNotBought: <<var(--red-text-color)|Penalties are active because you have not leveled up Antiquities of Ant God!>>

perkNames.platonicClones: Klone von Platonic klicken auf Ihrem Desktop

validation.finite: Value must be a finite number!
validation.fraction: Yeah, that isn't an integer. We don't accept fractions here!
validation.goldenQuarksTooMany: Sorry, I cannnot sell you this many Golden Quarks! Try buying fewer of them or typing -1 to buy max!
validation.finiteInt: Value must be a finite, non-decimal number!
validation.invalidNumber: Hey! That's not a valid number!

general.multiBuyInstructions: Buy multiple levels at once by holding <<var(--orchid-text-color)|'SHIFT'>> while clicking!

updateAlerts.june282021: June 28, 2021: V2.5.3. You have been refunded quarks from calculators if you purchased them. They are no longer refundable so be wary!
updateAlerts.july22021: July 2, 2021: V2.5.5. You have been refunded quarks from Powder EX upgrade, if you purchased levels. Your T1 ants were also reset and base cost set to 1e700 particles. Powder EX is no longer refundable, though, so be careful!
updateAlerts.sing230Balancing: Due to balancing changes, you were sent back to Singularity 230 to prevent softlocking your savefile!
updateAlerts.december22xxxx: You have loaded into the December 22 patch v1.
updateAlerts.january42023: You have loaded into the January 4, 2023 Patch v1.
updateAlerts.v297hotfix1NoSing: You have loaded into the version 2.9.7 hotfix 1!
updateAlerts.v297hotfix1Sing: You have loaded into the version 2.9.7 hotfix 1! Your uncapped resource singularity upgrades have been refunded! Sorry for the inconvenience.

general.languageChange: Changing the language requires a reload! Would you like to reload now?
general.exportYourGame: You haven't exported your game in a while, you better export it soon or you could lose it!

descriptions.1: Erhöhe die Produktion der Arbeiter mit jedem gekauften Produzenten.
descriptions.2: Increase production of Investments per producer bought.
descriptions.3: Increase production of Printers per producer bought.
descriptions.4: Increase production of Mints per producer bought.
descriptions.5: Increase production of Alchemies per producer bought.
descriptions.6: Increase all production based on producer bought.
descriptions.7: Gain free multipliers based on your purchased Alchemies.
descriptions.8: Gain 1 free Accelerator per 7 purchased Multipliers.
descriptions.9: Gain 1 free Multiplier per 10 purchased Accelerators.
descriptions.10: Verbessere Arbeiter basierend auf den ersten 750 gekauften Kapitalanlagen.
descriptions.11: Accelerators improve generation production by 2% each.
descriptions.12: Each Prestige multiplies production by 1.01, multiplicatively (Max: 1e4x).
descriptions.13: Augments buff the production of Investments.
descriptions.14: Free Accelerators buff generation of Printers.
descriptions.15: Free Accelerators buff generation of Mints.
descriptions.18: Multiply Printer production based on Mythos Shards.
descriptions.19: Multiply Investment production based on Mythos.
descriptions.20: Coin upgrade 1 is raised to the eleventh power.
descriptions.21: Gain 1 Multiplier and 5 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.22: Gain 1 Multiplier and 4 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.23: Gain 1 Multiplier and 3 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.24: Gain 1 Multiplier and 2 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.25: Gain 1 Multiplier and 1 Accelerators plus 1% more free Multipliers/Accelerators.
descriptions.27: Gain free Accelerators based on unspent Coins.
descriptions.28: Gain a free Multiplier per 160 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.29: Gain a free Accelerator per 80 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.30: Gain free Multipliers based on unspent Coins.
descriptions.31: Gain 1 free Accelerator Boost per 2,000 Coin producers bought.
descriptions.32: Gain free Accelerators based on Unspent Diamonds.
descriptions.33: Gain 1 free Multiplier for each Accelerator Boost owned.
descriptions.36: Multiply Crystal production by Diamonds, maximum 1e5000x.
descriptions.37: Multiply Mythos Shard production by the squared logarithm of Diamonds.
descriptions.38: Gain +20% more Offerings thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.39: Gain +60% more Ant Speed thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.40: Gain +25% more Ant Sacrifice rewards thanks to generous Discord Server Boosters!
descriptions.41: Multiply production based on unspent Mythos.
descriptions.42: Multiply Mythos Shard production based on unspent Diamonds.
descriptions.43: Multiply coin production by 1.01 per Transcension (Max: 1e30x).
descriptions.44: Multiply Mythos gain on Transcend by 1.01 per Transcension (Max: 1e6x).
descriptions.45: Gain free Accelerators based on Mythos Shards.
descriptions.46: Accelerator Boosts are 5% stronger and do not reset Prestige features.
descriptions.47: Multiply Mythos Shard production based on your AP.
descriptions.48: Multiply production based on owned Accelerators and Multipliers.
descriptions.49: Gain free Multipliers based on unspent Mythos.
descriptions.50: Gain +25% free Accelerators and Multipliers, but ONLY while doing Challenges.
descriptions.51: Increase production of all Mythos buildings based on owned Accelerator Boosts.
descriptions.53: Augments produce more Shards based on Acceleration Multiplier.
descriptions.54: Wizards produce more Enchantments based on Multiplier.
descriptions.55: Grandmasters produce more Oracles based on Building power.
descriptions.59: Coin Mint production is multiplied by 1e+25000.
descriptions.61: Welcome to Reincarnation! +5% Offering Recycle, +2 EXP/Offering!
descriptions.62: Completing Challenges, automatically or manually, increase Offerings gained in Reincarnation. Bonus subject to time multiplier!
descriptions.63: Crystal Production is multiplied based on Particles to the sixth power [Caps at 1e6000x].
descriptions.64: Mythos Shard Production is multiplied by your Particles squared.
descriptions.65: Multiply the gain of Particles from Reincarnation by 5x!
descriptions.66: When you use an Offering, every unlocked rune will get 1 free experience.
descriptions.67: Atom gain is increased by 3% per Particle producer purchased!
descriptions.68: Gain a free Multiplier for every 1e1000x increase in tax.
descriptions.69: Gain more Obtainium based on your particle gain. [Works with automation at a reduced rate!]
descriptions.70: Time seems to go +0.333*log10(MAX Obtainium +1)% faster when you buy this.
descriptions.71: Runes will gain (Rune Level/25) additional EXP per Offering used.
descriptions.72: Obtainium gain from Reincarnations is multiplied (1 + 2C) where C is #Reincarnation Challenges completed, up to 50x!
descriptions.73: Gain +100% free Accelerator Boosts and +10 free Crystal Upgrade levels, but only in Reincarnation Challenges.
descriptions.74: Erhalte mehr Obtainium basierend auf der höchsten Zahl an jemals gehaltenen Opfergaben. [Max: 100,000]
descriptions.75: Offering gain is increased based on highest ever unspent Obtainium [Max: 30,000,000 Obtainium]
descriptions.76: Ant generation kinda slow? I agree! Make all Ant tiers 5x faster!
descriptions.77: This is Synergism, right? Let's make each purchased Ant make all Ants 0.4% faster.
descriptions.78: Multipliziert die Geschwindigkeit von Ameisten mit der Formel (1 + 0.005 * (log10(MAX Opfergaben+ 1))^2).
descriptions.79: The Ant God will accept an arbitrary number of Particles in order to give you 10% more from sacrifices.
descriptions.80: The Ant God will accept a larger arbitrary number of Particles to give you more Ant ELO.
descriptions.84: Automatically buy Coin Mints if affordable.
descriptions.88: Automatically buy Accelerator Boosts if affordable.
descriptions.93: Generate 1% of Diamond Gain from prestiging per second.
descriptions.99: Automatically buy Mythos Upgrades if affordable.
descriptions.100: Generate 1% of Mythos Gain from transcending per second.
descriptions.106: Raffinerien produzieren Alchemisten nach der Formel Raffinerien^0.10.
descriptions.107: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.10 auf 0.25.
descriptions.108: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.25 auf 0.50.
descriptions.109: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.50 auf 0.75.
descriptions.110: Raffinerien -> Alchemisten-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.75 auf 1.
descriptions.111: Verstärker produzieren Pandora-Boden nach der Formel Verstärker^0.08.
descriptions.112: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.08 auf 0.16.
descriptions.113: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.16 auf 0.24.
descriptions.114: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.24 auf 0.32.
descriptions.115: Verstärker -> Pandora-Box-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.32 auf 0.40.
descriptions.116: Protone produzieren Großmeister nach der Formel Protone^0.05.
descriptions.117: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.05 auf 0.10.
descriptions.118: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.10 auf 0.15.
descriptions.119: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.15 auf 0.20.
descriptions.120: Protonen -> Großmeister-Exponent erhöht sich von 0.20 auf 0.25.
descriptions.121: Das wurde vermutlich schon automatisch gekauft. -50% Steuern!
descriptions.122: Die Obergrenze vom dritten Kristall-Upgrade erhöht sich von +12% auf +100%!
descriptions.123: Erhöhe die Münzproduktion um die Potenz 1.025. Mehr EXPONENTEN.
descriptions.125: Der konstante Steuerdivisor erhöht sich um 0.333% pro abgschlossener Herausforderung 10. [Divisor^(1 + Upgrade)]

crystalUpgrades.1: Erhalte 5% multiplikative Erhöhrung auf Kristalle pro AP pro Level.
crystalUpgrades.2: Erhalte mehr Kristalle, umso mehr Münzen du hast, pro Level.
crystalUpgrades.3: Jeder gekaufte Kristallproduzent erhöht die Generierung von Kristallproduzenten um 0.1% pro Level. [MAX: {{max}}%]
crystalUpgrades.4: Verbessert den Multiplikator auf die Münzproduktion um den Exponent 0.05 pro Level. [MAX: +{{max}}]
crystalUpgrades.5: Jede abgeschlossene Transzendenz-Herausforderung erhöht die Kristallproduktion um 1% pro Level.

constantEffects.7: +{{x}} free Rune Levels, +{{y}} to Rune Cap

constantUpgrades.1: Alle Tesserakt-Gebäude sind um {{level}}% produktiver, pro Level.
constantUpgrades.2: Jedes gekaufte Tesserakt-Gebäude erhöht die Produktion aller Tesserakt-Gebäude um 0.1% pro Level [Max {{max}}%].
constantUpgrades.3: Erhöht die erhaltenen Opfergaben um +2% pro Level.
constantUpgrades.6: Add +2 free Ant Levels per level.
constantUpgrades.7: Provides 7 free rune levels and increases the rune cap by 3 per level.
constantUpgrades.8: Erhöhe die Runen-EXP aus Opfergaben um 10% pro Level [Additive]
constantUpgrades.9: When bought, rune effectiveness is increased by Log4(Talisman Shards +1) %
constantUpgrades.10: When bought, gain Log4(Constant + 1)% more Wow! Cubes and Tesseracts on Ascension.

effects.20: Effect: All coin production is further multiplied by {{x}} [Stacks with upgrade 1]!
effects.37: Effect: All Mythos producers production x{{x}}
effects.38: Effect: Thank you for getting the server above 30 boosts!
effects.39: Effect: Thank you for getting the server above 30 boosts!
effects.40: Effect: Thank you for getting the server above 30 boosts!
effects.41: Effect: Welcome to Transcension! Coin production is multiplied by {{x}}.
effects.42: Effect: All Mythos Shard producers are going into overdrive: x{{x}} the production!
effects.43: Effect: Multiply all coin production by {{x}}!
effects.44: Effect: Multiply Mythos gained in Transcension by {{x}}!
effects.46: Effect: It's kinda self-evident, ain't it?
effects.48: Effect: Multiply coin production by a factor of {{x}}!
effects.50: Effect: It's quite obvious what the benefit is, but you must be in a Challenge for it to be in use!
effects.52: Effect: Mythos-tier producers production x{{x}}! It's like inception, or something.
effects.53: Effect: Augments will produce {{x}}x as many Mythos Shards.
effects.54: Effect: Wizards will produce {{x}}x as many Enchantments; What productive spirits!
effects.55: Effect: Grandmasters will produce {{x}}x as many Oracles!
effects.56: Effect: It's quite obvious, ain't it?
effects.61: Effect: +5% Offering Recycle/+2EXP per Offerings. Duh!
effects.62: Effect: Base Offering amount for Reincarnations +{{x}}. Challenge yourself!
effects.64: Effect: All Mythos Shard production x{{x}}
effects.65: Effect: 5x Particle gain from Reincarnations. Duh!
effects.66: Effect: It's quite clear in the description!
effects.67: Effect: The first particle-tier producer is {{x}}x as productive.
effects.68: Effect: Your compliance with tax laws provides you with {{x}} free Multipliers, for some reason.
effects.69: Effect: Cosmic Magnetics will allow you to gain {{x}}x as much Obtainium reincarnating x{{y}} automatic gain.
effects.70: Effect: Contracted time makes your game timers run {{x}}% more quickly.
effects.71: Effect: Writing's on the wall. Look above!

footnotes.buildings: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the corresponding tier starting from the top. Press [A] to buy Accelerator, [M] to buy Multiplier, or [B] to buy Accelerator Boost.
footnotes.buildings2: Press [Left arrow] or [Right arrow] to switch tabs. Enjoy!
footnotes.crystals: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the respective tiered producer. Press [6], [7], [8], [9] or [0] to buy the corresponding Crystal upgrade starting on the left.
footnotes.mythos: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the respective tiered producer.
footnotes.particle: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the respective tiered producer.
footnotes.upgrade: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], [5] or [6] on your keyboard to use resources for each upgrades.

achievements.purple: Purple background: Unachieved, provides bonus multiplier.
achievements.red: Red background: Unachieved, provides content/feature unlock.

footnotes.runes: Press [1], [2], [3], [4] or [5] on your keyboard to use offerings for each rune, starting with Speed Rune on the left; must have rune unlocked to use hotkey!

challenges.hotkey: Press [1], [2]... up to [0] to enter challenges 1 to 10. Press [E] to exit your Transcension or Reincarnation challenge if stuck!
challenges.finishTranscension: If you are unable to finish a Transcension challenge, press the hotkey listed above OR click on the red Challenge "C" button on the reset buttons on top.
challenges.leaveReincarnation: To leave a reincarnation challenge, press the grey Challenge "C" instead!

footnotes.research: Welcome to the future! Obtainium is gained through <<var(--green-text-color);|Reincarnations>>. I'd recommend studying the <<limegreen;|green-bordered>> researches first. The <<var(--crimson-text-color);|red-bordered>> researches are never reset whereas the <<white;|white-bordered>> researches will reset upon the next reset tier!
footnotes.shop: Halte auf jeden Teil des Markts um zu sehen was die Upgrades machen!

octeractStarter.name: Octeracts for Dummies
octeractStarter.description: Hello... I Am Derpsmith... The Ancestor Of Ant God... I Did Not Expect You To Get Here. Here Is 30% More Quarks, 20% More Octeracts, And 100,000x Ant Speed...
octeractStarter.effect: You have {{n}} paid your respects to Derpsmith.

octeractGain.name: Octeract Cogenesis
octeractGain.description: Have you despised how slow these damn things are? Gain 1% more of them per level! Simple.

octeractGain2.name: Octeract Trigenesis
octeractGain2.description: It turns out that you have six additional dimensions to modify your Cogenesis. +1% more Octs per level!

octeractQuarkGain.name: Quark Octeract
octeractQuarkGain.description: An altered forme of the hepteract, this gives a 1.1% Quark Bonus per level without Diminishing Return.

octeractQuarkGain2.name: Octo-Hepteract Primality Synergism
octeractQuarkGain2.description: For every 111 levels of Quark Octeract, you gain 0.01% more quarks per digit in your Quark Hepteract count per level!

octeractCorruption.name: EXTRA CHONKY Corruptions
octeractCorruption.description: Adds one level to the cap on corruptions. Derpsmith approves.
octeractCorruption.effect: Corruption level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractGQCostReduce.name: EXTRA WIMPY Golden Quark Costs!
octeractGQCostReduce.description: Reduziert die Kosten von Goldenen Quarks im Markt um 1% pro Level.

octeractExportQuarks.name: Improved Download Speeds
octeractExportQuarks.description: Thanks to ethernet technology, export quarks are increased by 40% per level! Only normal ones.

octeractImprovedDaily.name: CHONKER Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily.description: Derpsmith hackt sich in den Quellcode und fügt +1 tägliches kostenloses Singularität-Upgrade von 'daily' hinzu.
octeractImprovedDaily.effect: Der Code 'daily' gibt +{{n}} kostenlose Singularität-Upgrades pro Nutzung.

octeractImprovedDaily2.name: CHONKERER Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily2.description: Derpsmith implemented hyperspeed multiplication. +1% more free Singularity upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily2.effect: Der Code 'daily' gibt +{{n}}% kostenlose Singularität-Upgrades pro Nutzung.

octeractImprovedDaily3.name: CHONKEREREST Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily3.description: Derpsmith wird nie zufrieden sein. +1 +0,5% mehr kostenlose Singularität-Upgrades pro Tag von 'daily'!
octeractImprovedDaily3.effect: Der Code 'daily' gibt +{{n}} kostenlose Singularität-Upgrades pro Nutzung.

octeractImprovedQuarkHept.name: I wish for even better Quark Hepteracts.
octeractImprovedQuarkHept.description: The godmother is absent, but Derpsmith is here! +2% DR exponent per level. Stacks additively with all the others!

octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.name: The forbidden clock of time
octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.description: Vermutlich in einer hyperbolischen Zeitkammer eingeschlossen! +1% Globale-Geschwindigkeit pro Stufe pro Singularität!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.name: Abstract Photokinetics
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.description: Gain +0.05% Ascension Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.name: Abstract Exokinetics
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.description: Gain +0.02% Ascension Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedFree.name: Wow! I want free upgrades to be better.
octeractImprovedFree.description: Singularity Upgrade level is (paid level * free levels)^0.6 instead of being added.
octeractImprovedFree.effect: Singularity Upgrade free levels are {{n}} being powered!

octeractImprovedFree2.name: Wow! Free upgrades still suck.
octeractImprovedFree2.description: Who said beggars can't be choosers? Extends the exponent of the first upgrade to 0.65.

octeractImprovedFree3.name: Wow! Make free upgrades good already, Platonic!
octeractImprovedFree3.description: Extends the exponent of the free upgrades to 0.70.

octeractImprovedFree4.name: Coupon of Ultimate Penniless Derpsmiths
octeractImprovedFree4.description: Each level adds 0.001 to the exponent of free upgrades, with the first level adding another 0.01!

octeractSingUpgradeCap.name: Overwriting Pointers
octeractSingUpgradeCap.description: Derpsmith encountered a SegFault after reassigning null... +1 to level cap on certain Singularity Upgrades per level!
octeractSingUpgradeCap.effect: Some Singularity Upgrades have +{{n}} max level!

octeractAscensions.name: Voided Warranty
octeractAscensions.description: Gain +1% Ascension Count per level, with a 2% bonus for every 10 levels.

octeractAscensions2.name: Hidden Late Fees
octeractAscensions2.description: Gain +1% Ascension Count per level, with a 2% bonus for every 10 levels. But... this scales a lot faster. Must be those hidden late fees.

octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.name: Digital Octeract Accumulator
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.description: Octeract gain is 1% faster for every digit in your Ascension count!
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.effect: Octeract Gain per OOM Ascension count +{{n}}%

octeractFastForward.name: Derpsmith's Singularity Discombobulator
octeractFastForward.description: Each level makes Singularity give +100% Golden Quarks (additive) and singularity at all time highest count grants +1 singularity count!
octeractFastForward.effect: Singularities give {{n100}}% more GQ and count as {{n}} more.

octeractAutoPotionSpeed.name: Pill of Increased Thirst
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.description: You can buy pills of thirst-making to consume potions automatically faster! 4% faster per level to be precise.
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.effect: Auto Potion Singularity Perk works {{n}}% faster than before!

octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.name: Vitamin O Infusion
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.description: Thanks to the generosity of your Derpsmith, Potions are 2% more potent per level!
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.effect: Potions give {{n}}% more Offerings and Obtainium.

octeractOneMindImprover.name: Infinite Transcription of the One Mind
octeractOneMindImprover.description: You ask what this upgrade does, but Derpsmith just nods his head. What is he hiding from you?
octeractOneMindImprover.effect: One Mind converts Ascension Speed to Octeract Gain to the power of {{n}}.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Florentine Cranberries
octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +2 Ambrosia Luck, which can increase Ambrosia drop amounts when Blueberries generate Ambrosia.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Berries of a Four Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +3 Ambrosia Luck per level.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck.name: Berries of an Eight Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +4 Ambrosial Luck per level, and it is infinitely levelable!

octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.name: Berries of a Ten Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds ☘ +5 Ambrosial Luck. And it's mega expensive somehow.

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Hourglass of Minutiae
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat primative hourglass which somehow makes your blueberries generate seconds 1% faster per level..

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Hourglass of Myopathy
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still primative, though somehow less so. +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Hourglass of Infinitude
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Don't get it twisted- this hourglass is really primative. But it gives +1% Blueberry Second Generation per level and is infinitely levelable!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Hourglass of Reality
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is nonprimative and 'more timely'- whatever that means. +2% Blueberry Second Generation per level.

levelup.1: +(Level/4)^1.25 Accelerator, +0.25% Accelerators per level. +1 Accelerator Boost every 20 levels!
levelup.2: +(Level/10) Multipliers every 10th level, +0.25% Multipliers per level. Tax growth is delayed more for each level!
levelup.3: ~(1 + (Level/2)^2 * 2^(Level/2) / 256)x Crystal Production. +1 free level for each Crystal upgrade per 16 levels!
levelup.4: +0.125% building cost growth delay per level, +0.0625% Offering recycle chance per level [MAX: 25%], 2^((1000 - Level)/1100) Tax growth multiplier AFTER level 400
levelup.5: ~(1 + level/200)x Obtainium, (1 + Level^2/2500)x Ant Hatch Speed, +0.005 base Offerings for each tier per level
levelup.6: +0.2% Quarks, +1% all Cube types per level! Start with +10% Quarks.
levelup.7: I wonder what happens if you feed it {{exp}} Rune EXP.

noSingularityUpgrades.name: No Singularity Upgrades
noSingularityUpgrades.description: Simply put, you have to beat the target singularity without (most) Singularity Upgrades. Octeracts, Perks and Quality of Life Singularity Upgrades are preserved.
noSingularityUpgrades.rewardDescription: Each completion increases cube gain of every dimension by 50%! First completion gives +12% Golden Quarks and a Blueberry! 20th awards something `special` ;)

oneChallengeCap.name: One Challenge Caps
oneChallengeCap.description: Beat the target Singularity, but the first 14 Challenges have cap of only 1!
oneChallengeCap.rewardDescription: Each completion increases Corruption Multiplier Values by 0.03, no matter what. First Completion gives +3 to Reincarnation Challenge Cap. 20th completion grants +1 free Corruption level!

noOcteracts.name: No Octeract Effects
noOcteracts.description: Beat the target Singularity, but octeracts and their upgrades do nothing! Effective Singularity is also much higher based on tier.
noOcteracts.rewardDescription: Each completion increases Octeract to Cube Bonus power by 0.02 (BASE: 2.00). First completion adds a bonus to Offerings based on Octeracts. Final completion adds a bonus to Obtainium based on Octeracts.

limitedAscensions.name: Twenty Ascensions Challenge
limitedAscensions.description: Derpsmith put an embargo on Ascensions. Only (20 - completions) are allowed throughout the entire Singularity, before Ascensions trigger massive debuffs! Ascension Count Multiplier is hardcapped at 1. Oh and Delta is disabled. Ha.
limitedAscensions.rewardDescription: Jeder Abschluss gibt 0,1% Aufstiegs-Geschwindigkeit pro Stelle in deiner Aufstiegsanzahl! Der erste Abschluss verdoppelt die Obergrenze aller Hepterakte. Der letzte Abschluss fügt dem Markt einen weiteren Taschenrechner zu!

platonics.instructions: Open up some Lootb-- er, Platonic! Cubes, for epic perks!.
platonics.inventory: You possess <<yellow|{{amount}}>> Wow! Platonic Cubes. Get them from ascending with at least 2.666e12 score!
platonics.total: You have a total of <<yellow|{{amount}}>> Platonic Cubes opened!

items.1: Cube Shard: x{{amount}}: +{{bonus}}% Bonus Wow! Cubes
items.2: Tesseract Shard: x{{amount}}: +{{bonus}}% Bonus Wow! Tesseracts
items.3: Hypercube Shard: x{{amount}}: +{{bonus}}% Bonus Wow! Hypercubes
items.4: Platonic Remnant: x{{amount}}: +{{bonus}}% Bonus Platonic! Cubes

items.6: Keynesian Statue: x{{amount}}: +{{bonus}}% Bonus Constant exponent on taxes

hepteractForge.noTimeToWaste: Oh well, no time to waste. This is your lab. Make cool stuff with your Hepteracts!
hepteractForge.noPassiveBonus: Hepteracts do not provide passive bonuses. They must be made useful through crafting.
hepteractForge.youPossessHepteracts: You possess <<yellow|{{x}}>> Hepteracts! You know where to get these, right?
hepteractForge.autoCraftPercentagePrompt: Enter a number from 0 to 100 (integer only!) to set autocraft percentage. Every ascension, that percentage of your hepteracts are used to craft equally split between every hepteract with AUTO ON. Auto crafting also does not consume other resources! [Except Quarks, of course...]

chronos.effect: This hepteract bends time, in your favor. +0.06% Ascension Speed per Chronos Hepteract.
chronos.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Obtainium!

hyperrealism.effect: This bad boy can make hypercube gain skyrocket. +0.06% Hypercubes per Hyperreal Hepteract.
hyperrealism.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Offerings.

quark.effect: One pound, two pound fish, fishy grant +0.05% Quarks per Quark Hepteract fish fish.
quark.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Quarks.

challenge.effect: That's preposterous. How are you going to gain +0.05% C15 Exponent per Challenge Hepteract? How!?
challenge.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts, {{y}} Platonic Cubes and {{z}} Cubes.

abyss.effect: It seems like this holds the power to be at the End of Time. Do you remember why you need this?
abyss.currentEffect: <[You will submit to the Omega Entity of Time]>
abyss.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Wow! Cubes (lol)

accelerator.effect: Haha, stupid Corruptions. +2,000 +0.03% Uncorruptable Accelerators per 'Way too many accelerators' Hepteract!
accelerator.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Wow! Tesseracts

acceleratorBoost.effect: Haha, stupid Corruptions. +0.1% Accelerator Boosts per 'Way too many accelerator boosts' Hepteract!
acceleratorBoost.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Hypercubes

multiplier.effect: Haha, stupid Corruptions. +1,000 +0.03% Uncorruptable Multipliers per 'Way too many multipliers' Hepteract!
multiplier.oneCost: One of these will cost you {{x}} Hepteracts and {{y}} Obtainium

 You can buy up to {{x}} with your hepteracts.

hepteracts.allCubeGainExtended: ALL Cube Gain +{{x}}% [Multiplicative], +{{y}}% Quarks [Multiplicative], Ascension Count +{{z}}%, Tesseract Building Production x{{a}} [From Platonic Upgrade 4x1]
hepteracts.powderLumps: You have {{x}} lumps of Overflux Powder.
hepteracts.expiredOrbs: Expired Overflux Orbs become powder at a rate of {{x}} Orbs per powder lump!
hepteracts.warpImpossible: Warpen ist nicht möglich (stattdessen erhältst du einen Multiplikator für Quarks)
hepteracts.machineCooldown: Sorry, but this machine is on cooldown.
hepteracts.atleastPowder: Tut mir leid, aber du brauchst 25 Pulver, um die Warp-Maschine zu bedienen.
hepteracts.stumbleMachine: Du stolperst auf eine geheimnisvolle Maschine. Eine beigefügte Notiz besagt, dass du die täglichen Würfel Öffnungen für 25 Pulver zurücksetzen kannst. Es funktioniert jedoch nur einmal pro Tag (Echtzeit). Bist du dabei?
hepteracts.walkAwayMachine: You walk away from the machine, powder intact.
hepteracts.useMachine: Nach Nutzung der Maschine fühlen sich deine Würfel ein wenig lohnenswerter an. Die Anzahl der täglichen Würfel Öffnungen wurde zurückgesetzt! [-25 Pulver]
hepteracts.useAllWarpsPrompt:
Wenn du das AUS schaltest, verbraucht du alle deine verbleibenden Warps (ohne einen Warp durchzuführen).
Bist du sicher?
hepteracts.machineDidNotConsume: Die Maschine hat deine Warps nicht verbraucht.
hepteracts.boostQuarksPrompt:
Diese Maschine erhöht, basierend auf der Anzahl der Warps die du übrig hast, von geöffneten Würfeln erhaltenen Quarks. Während es AN ist, wird es unmöglich sein zu warpen und es auszuschalten wird nicht so einfach sein.
Bist du sicher, dass du es aktivieren möchtest?
hepteracts.machineOverdrive:
Die Maschine wird übersteuern,
sobald du ein paar Warps hast.
hepteracts.machineUsualContinue: Machine will continue to work as usual, for now.

main.dataPersistent: Data on this page is now persistent! If you do not know what this means, you can safely ignore it.
main.starRepo: Please show your appreciation by giving the GitHub repo a star. ❤️ https://github.com/pseudo-corp/SynergismOfficial
main.transferredFromLZ: Transferred save to new format successfully!
main.allCorruptionsZero: All Corruptions have been set to Zero. This will take effect on the next Ascension.
main.corruptionLoadoutApplied: Corruption Loadout {{x}} "{{y}}" has been applied. This will take effect on the next Ascension.
main.ascendPrompt: Ascending will reset all buildings, rune levels [NOT CAP!], talismans, most researches, and the anthill feature for Cubes of Power. Continue?
main.reincarnatePrompt: Reincarnating will reset EVERYTHING but in return you will get extraordinarily powerful Particles, and unlock some very strong upgrades and some new features. would you like to Reincarnate? [Disable this message in settings.]
main.transcendPrompt: Transcends will reset coin and prestige upgrades, coin producers, crystal producers AND diamonds. The first Transcension unlocks new features. Would you like to Transcend? [Toggle this message in settings.]
main.prestigePrompt: Prestige will reset coin upgrades, coin producers AND crystals. The first Prestige unlocks new features. Would you like to Prestige? [Toggle this message in settings.]
main.welcomeToSingularity: Welcome to Singularity #{{x}}. You're back to familiar territory, but something doesn't seem right.
main.singularityCancelled: If you decide to change your mind, let me know. -Ant God
main.singularityMessage1: You have reached the end of the game, on Singularity #{{x}}. Platonic and the Ant God are proud of you.
main.singularityMessage2: You may choose to sit on your laurels, and consider the game 'beaten', or you may do something more interesting.
main.singularityMessage3: You're too powerful for this current universe. The multiverse of Synergism is truly endless, but out there are even more challenging universes parallel to your very own.
main.singularityMessage4: Start anew, and enter Singularity #{{x}}. Your next universe is harder than your current one, but unlock a permanent +10% Quark Bonus, +10% Ascension Count Bonus, and Gain {{y}} Golden Quarks, which can purchase game-changing endgame upgrades [Boosted by {{z}}% due to patreon bonus!].
main.singularityMessage5: However, all your past accomplishments are gone! ALL Challenges, Refundable Shop upgrades, Upgrade Tab, Runes, All Cube upgrades, All Cube Openings, Hepteracts (Except for your Quark Hepteracts), Achievements will be wiped clean.
main.singularityConfirm0: Do you wish to start singularity #{{x}}? Your next universe is harder but you will gain {{y}} Golden Quarks.
main.singularityConfirm1: So, what do you say? Do you wish to enter the Singularity?
main.singularityConfirm2: Are you sure you wish to enter the Singularity?
main.singularityConfirm3: Are you REALLY SURE? You cannot go back from this (without an older savefile)! Confirm one last time to finalize your decision.
main.noAntiquity: Hmph. Please return with an Antiquity. Thank you. -Ant God
main.insideSingularityChallenge: Derpsmith thinks you are in a Singularity Challenge. You may exit it by clicking on the challenge icon in the Singularity tab.
main.gameBeat: Well. It seems you've reached the eye of the Singularity. I'm pleased. This also means there is nowhere to go from here. At least, not until higher powers expand your journey.
main.exitAscensionChallenge: Are you absolutely sure that you want to exit the Ascension Challenge? You will need to clear challenge 10 again before you can attempt the challenge again!

aprilFools.introText: The <<white|Unsmith>> spins at you, telepathically communicating: 'This is NOT a <<white|Rick>><<red|Roll>>, I swear. Just click me already!'
aprilFools.clicked: See? Yet another reason to trust Unsmith. Ah well. For clicking me, you gain 5% more Offerings, Obtainium, and ALL Cubes until you refresh the page!
aprilFools.clickedText: You have clicked the <<white|Unsmith>>! Until refresh, gain <<orange|+5% Offerings>>, <<pink|+5% Obtainium>>, <<white|+5% ALL Cubes>>!
